Description: Ostracon, coarse fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the other surfaces are partially covered with a cream-coloured encrustation, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and very faint traces of one line of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394167) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394167)
